statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 100 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE packet_size > 1500 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE event_id = 100 AND severity > 5;
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 100 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.100';
DELETE FROM cybersecurity_events WHERE event_type = 'DDoS Attack' AND severity > 7;
DELETE FROM malicious_traffic_data WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND attack_type = 'DDoS';
